Hi! My name is Gaetano Scaduto, I am 26 years old, I come from Agrigento, Sicily (see background!), and I live in Antwerp (Belgium).

I am a postdoctoral researcher at the [Erasmus Institute on Culture and Stratification](https://www.eur.nl/en/essb/research/erasmus-institute-culture-and-stratification/researchers), part of the [Governance and Pluralism](https://www.eur.nl/en/essb/about-essb/academic-teams/governance-and-pluralism) team at Erasmus University of Rotterdam. I work on the project "[Understanding the different meanings of climate change among the public](https://www.nwo.nl/en/projects/domyz32585)", a comparative, mixed-methods project aiming at understanding the different meanings attributed to climate change in the Netherlands and Italy.

I consider my research interests broad and interdisciplinary, ranging from political sociology to social psychology and communications. In the past, I've worked on several topics, such as [political stereotypes](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/13608746.2024.2411539), [politicians' communication online](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/10.1177/19401612251339107?int.sj-full-text.similar-articles.9), [privacy protection behavior online](https://doi.org/10.1177/%2008944393251341201), and [political talk show pundits in Italy](https://www.rivisteweb.it/doi/10.%203270/115244).

On this website, you can find my CV, bio, publications, teaching materials, and some personal material I decide to share!
